name: Ext_R5_Contract_legallyBinding
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Contract.legallyBinding[x] for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Contract.legallyBinding[x] from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Contract|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: Legally binding Contract: This is the signed and legally recognized representation of the Contract, which is considered the "source of truth" and which would be the basis for legal action related to enforcement of this Contract.
element.comment: `Contract.legallyBinding[x]` maps to R4B `Contract.legallyBinding[x]`.  So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
